channel.title: Experiences on Mohammed Noman
channel.description: Recent content in Experiences on Mohammed Noman

item.title: Research Assistant @ University of East London
item.description: Conducted analysis on video clips containing cardiomyocytes to detect beat rate and other parameters. Developed predictive models for Network Intrusion detection system using Python and Spark. Implemented Power BI dashboard for academic departments, enhancing efficiency by 15%

item.title: Software Developer @ Hudas Technologies
item.description: Developed a CRM primarily in React and Python Django. Improved customer experience by 30%(over 10000 customers) by implementing the CRM. All code was reviewed, perfected, and pushed to production

item.title: Software Developer @ PES College
item.description: Developed a CRM primarily in React and Python Django. Improved customer experience by 30%(over 10000 customers) by implementing the CRM. All code was reviewed, perfected, and pushed to production
